title: What are the best hotels in Singapore under $100 and clean
excerpt: Finding affordable hotels in Singapore that maintain high cleanliness standards can be a daunting task. With so many options available, travelers often struggle to balance budget constraints with the desire for a comfortable and hygienic stay. This curated list highlights the best hotels under $100, ensuring that you can enjoy a pleasant experience without breaking the bank.
intro: Discover the top clean and budget-friendly hotels in Singapore, perfect for travelers looking to maximize comfort while minimizing expenses.

hotels.name: Hotel 81 Lucky
hotels.description: Discover a tranquil oasis at Hotel 81 Lucky, conveniently located just 650 meters from Aljunied MRT Station, offering easy access to attractions like OneKM Shopping Mall and the Singapore Sports Hub. Enjoy modern comforts in well-appointed rooms equipped with tea/coffee makers and flat-screen TVs, while free WiFi and a 24-hour front desk ensure a seamless stay. Book now for a perfect blend of relaxation and convenience during your visit to Singapore.
hotels.highlight: Offers modern rooms with flat-screen TVs, free WiFi, and easy access to Aljunied MRT Station.

hotels.name: Hotel 81 Geylang
hotels.description: Experience a tranquil escape at Hotel 81 Geylang, conveniently located near the Singapore Sports Hub and Kallang Wave Mall, with easy access to the Aljunied MRT Station for effortless city exploration. Relax in cozy rooms featuring air conditioning, en suite bathrooms, and cable TV, while our 24-hour front desk ensures you have everything you need for a seamless stay. Discover the vibrant shopping and dining options nearby and make your Singapore getaway truly memorable.
hotels.highlight: Features clean, cozy rooms with air conditioning, en suite bathrooms, and 24-hour front desk service at an affordable rate.

hotels.name: Hotel 81 Premier Hollywood
hotels.description: Hotel 81 Premier Hollywood is perfectly situated in the lively Geylang District of Singapore, just a short stroll from the Singapore Sports Hub and Kallang Wave Mall, with easy access to Mountbatten MRT Station. Guests can enjoy modern comforts in their rooms, including a 40-inch LED TV, USB charging dock, and complimentary WiFi. Immerse yourself in the local culinary scene, featuring a delightful range of Peranakan and Malay dishes right at your doorstep.
hotels.highlight: Offers modern rooms with 40-inch LED TVs, USB charging docks, and complimentary WiFi in the vibrant Geylang District.

hotels.name: Hotel 81 Sakura
hotels.description: Hotel 81 Sakura is perfectly located on Joo Chiat Road, providing easy access to attractions like Peranakan House and OneKM Shopping Mall, with Paya Lebar MRT Station just 1.3 km away. The hotel offers comfortable air-conditioned rooms equipped with modern amenities, and a 24-hour front desk ready to assist with any needs. Enjoy the vibrant local area filled with diverse shopping and dining options, making it an ideal retreat for all travelers.
hotels.highlight: Hotel 81 Sakura offers comfortable air-conditioned rooms, family accommodations, and a 24-hour front desk for guest convenience.

hotels.name: Hotel 81 Selegie
hotels.description: Hotel 81 Selegie boasts a prime location in the vibrant Bugis District, providing easy access to attractions such as the National Museum of Singapore and Little India. Guests will appreciate the comfortable air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen TVs and en suite bathrooms, along with complimentary WiFi throughout the hotel. With convenient services like a tour desk, laundry facilities, and luggage storage, this hotel offers a seamless and enjoyable stay in the heart of Singapore.
hotels.highlight: Hotel 81 Selegie offers comfortable air-conditioned rooms, flat-screen TVs, and complimentary WiFi in the vibrant Bugis District.

hotels.name: Hotel 81 Premier Star
hotels.description: Hotel 81 (Premier) Star offers a prime location in vibrant Geylang, just a short walk from Aljunied MRT Station, making it an ideal spot for city exploration. Guests can enjoy modern, air-conditioned rooms equipped with satellite TV, a minibar, and complimentary WiFi, alongside the convenience of a private bathroom with a hot shower. With a 24-hour front desk ready to assist with tour arrangements and laundry services, your stay promises to be both comfortable and seamless.
hotels.highlight: Offers modern, air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV, minibar, and complimentary WiFi, all in a prime Geylang location.
